author: rafalechang
title: Before Will DApp
description: Most users lack the skills required to produce crypto wills. Furthermore, it can be challenging to calculate the value of digital assets.
solution: We aim to build a chatbot assistant that users, regardless of age or experience, can access to track their digital and physical assets.
experience: We are a team of experienced software developers, UI/UX designers, and mobile developers with a shared vision and passion for Cardano.
